messages.title: Julian Sets The Pace
messages.content: Early bookies favourite Julian Huppert vows to fight Brexit. In just a few weeks Cambridge residents will once again head to the polls for the 2019 general election and the stakes couldn’t be higher. Following Theresa May’s announcement of a snap election on 8th June, former MP Julian Huppert immediately thrown himself back onto the campaign trail...

messages.title: Protecting our NHS
messages.content: Julian reveals plan to save health services. With Conservatives continuing to rip the heart and soul out of our NHS, Corbyn’s Labour has no hopes of forming the next government...

messages.title: Labour in total meltdown
messages.content: More and more traditional Labour voters backing Julian. Early momentum across Cambridge is right – former MP Julian Huppert is once more the popular vote. More and more South Labour voters are crossing their support over to the passionate Remain campaigner...

messages.title: Election comment
messages.content: A Conservative vote will mean a hard Brexit - and cuts to health services. Time to get a different future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Conservative cuts and provide our doctors and nurses with the support they need.
Push for more funding for mental health care.
Increase funding for prevention of illness.
